channel.title: [PI] DefiantPk - Where your gear gets better and better
channel.description:
[center] After many attempts to make many servers before, and only few succeed by a hair, I have decided to go into deep development for about 6-12 months literally. But that includes vacations, school, homework, and crap I have to deal with. I am working on DefiantPk. It is a PVP server that has the ability to skill for money, you can do commands like ::melee, ::mage, ::range, ::vengrunes, ::barragerunes, ::hybrid, and much more to PVP. I want it to be amazing, that's why I'm going into major development. I can also use some help which can be found in the Recruitment spoiler.
Features Planned with Small Explanation [code] Cash - You will need to earn cash to purchase some objects that do not come with PK kits.
Upgraded Armor - Shown below is some armor that goes from one stage to a stronger stage. You need to purchase the upgraded gear/weapons by donating or earning major money.
"Defiant PKer" - Defiant PKer is an NPC that is near the Wild on the server who is pretty hard to defeat, you probably need the best type of food. He has a small chance of dropping a big lump of DefiantPk Tokens (a rare token used to claim things such as torva or upgraded gear).
Titles - There will be a loyalty shop with titles, the "loyalty points" are actually a kill count of how many players you've killed to get better titles.
Squeal of Fortune - We have a simple SOF feature, I really hope to improve it with the help of some developers and time.
That's about all for now. [/code]
Media
Upgraded Armor Before(Normal) - After(Upgraded/Stronger) [img]http://i.imgur.com/z3pp4xk.png[/img] [img]http://img841.imageshack.us/img841/5385/lgt240b.png[/img]
Before(Normal) - After(Upgraded/Stronger) [img]http://i.imgur.com/ICNvcNA.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/0AsXsKh.png[/img]
Pictures of upgraded Names [img]http://i.imgur.com/KhWbS5l.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/uQJ7wW2.png[/img]
(Almighty = Upgraded Torva)
Titles [img]http://img585.imageshack.us/img585/7559/lgt4a24.png[/img]
Defiant PKer [img]http://i.imgur.com/sm64ko8.png[/img]
Recruiting/Need Help [code] We desperately need some money to get the VPS and stuff up, but that can wait as I said I don't plan it to be released very soon. But if you want to please notify me, you will get extreme donator even if you donate a low amount.
Developers - Message Me/Comment 0/1 Needed
Moderators/Admins/Server Helpers - Message Me/Comment (A lot needed) [/code]
I still have a lot to be done, and I'll use this post to keep anyone who is interested updated.
[/center]

item.title: [PI] DefiantPk - Where your gear gets better and better
item.dc:creator: @Xa1 Xa
item.description:
@Xa1 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:7, topic:520432”][quote author=Xa link=topic=638928.msg4306876#msg4306876 date=1370016192]

The only way to make this work is to make it so donors can’t just buy the best armor but that instead everything has to be gained.

Edit:

Let me also add that if you are going to do it this way I HIGHLY suggest you actually PLAY your own server. This way you can actually see how long it takes to get whatever.

It’s not just for donators. DefiantPk Tokens may be hard to obtain without donating, but it’s still very possible to obtain stronger armor.

I also have a legit account, thanks for putting that out, but I am making sure it all works out fine

Thank you guys
[/quote]exactly my point. By giving donors the chance to obtain the armor before everybody else it offsets whatever type of skilling economy you set. You need to make it so the benefits donors can get are cosmetic somehow.

examples the huge list of ::titles in matrix source is donor only, donor signs, possibly even yell access.[/quote]
Oh, well I have most of that anyways for donors.
